name: PARTY_RELATED
title: PARTY_RELATED
description: Proxy type for identifying a party and its relationship to the subject of the record. Use where the relationship between the party and the subject of the record must be known.

element.short: Proxy type for identifying a party and its relationship to the subject of the record.
element.definition: Proxy type for identifying a party and its relationship to the subject of the record. Use where the relationship between the party and the subject of the record must be known.

element.short: Relationship of subject of this ENTRY to the subject of the record.
element.definition: Relationship of subject of this ENTRY to the subject of the record. May be coded. If it is the patient, coded as  self.
